snippet: Claims by President Donald Trump that his phones were wiretapped by his predecessor, Barack Obama, during the 2016 election campaign are a purely domestic matter for the United States, the spokesman for Russian President Vladimir Putin said Monday...

headline.main: Nigeria Seeks U.S. Immigration Clarity, Advises Against Non-Urgent Travel
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Seeks U.S. Immigration Clarity, Advises Against Non-Urgent Travel

lead_paragraph: Claims by President Donald Trump that his phones were wiretapped by his predecessor, Barack Obama, during the 2016 election campaign are a purely domestic matter for the United States, the spokesman for Russian President Vladimir Putin said Monday.
